channel.title: Upcoming OECD Publication Embargoes and Launches
channel.description: A list of dates and publications

item.title: Education systems, education reforms, and adult skills in the Survey of Adult Skills (PIAAC)
item.description: Education systems, education reforms, and adult skills in the Survey of Adult Skills (PIAAC) by Directorate for Education and Skills has an embargo on Wednesday, 10 October 2018, 11:00 Paris time (GMT+02:00).
